definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: (silence) whisper (on format. cf. Ba:NB 87)—[[וְאַחַר הָאֵשׁ קוֹל דְּמָמָה דַקָָּה]] 1Ki 19:12; [[דְּמָמָה זׇקוֹל אֶשְׁמָָע]] Job 4:16 a whisper and a voice, i.e. an articulate whisper (cf. Di); [[יׇקֵם סְעָרָה]] [[לִדְמָמָָה]] Ps 107:29 he settleth storm into whisper.
